title: To all those who had faith.
body:
Your faith was misplaced.



the 'nerf by buffing everything else' didn't work... 



as expected.

replies.body: I'm not one to pick thunderlords every game. Probably because I just like to change it up :)

Except when you look at the scoreboards of the NALCS and even the OPL. 
http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/League_Championship_Series/North_America/2016_Season/Spring_Season/Scoreboards
http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/OPL/2016_Season/Split_1/Scoreboards

Other regions show similar results too. Fervor is stronger on ADC's and Grasp is usually taken on top laners.

Well I killed an enemy Lux in one of my recent games with Deathfire. Wouldn't have got the kill without it cause I was well out of range and she was already running. But I agree it wasn't quite enough. That said, I'd rather they undertune and continue work, than overtune and have really skewed Opness going on.
